law.catch_line: Where action against tobacco growers and warehousemen must be brought.

text.section: Venue in a civil action against a tobacco grower for damages alleged as a result of use or consumption of tobacco products that may have been grown by that tobacco grower shall lie only in the county of residence of the tobacco grower.

Venue in a civil action against a warehouseman for damages alleged as a result of use or consumption of tobacco products that may have been sold by that warehouseman shall lie only in the county in which the tobacco warehouse is located.

law.history: Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 422, sec. 2, effective April 7, 1998.
